name: Consulancy Cost Estimator Design Concept
description: A high-level design direction inspired by 'Future Tech' aesthetics, characterized by deep dark backgrounds, vibrant neon accents, and depth through glassmorphism.

principles.name: Future Tech Aesthetic
principles.description: The interface should feel modern, sleek, and slightly futuristic. Use deep dark backgrounds contrasted with vibrant electric colors (cyan, green, purple).

principles.name: Depth through Glassmorphism
principles.description: Use translucent layers with backdrop blur to create depth and hierarchy. Content sits on 'glass' panes floating above the dark background.

principles.name: Vibrant Accents & Glows
principles.description: Use neon accents sparingly but effectively for primary actions and highlights. Interactive elements should emit a soft glow.

principles.name: Clean & Bold Typography
principles.description: Typography should be sans-serif (Inter) and highly readable. Headings are bold and often feature gradient text fills.

structure.containers: Content is grouped into rounded 'glass' cards.
structure.spacing: Generous spacing. Standard padding for cards is 2rem. Global section gap is 2-4rem.

colors.primary: Electric Cyan (#00f2ff) - Used for primary actions, focus states, and key highlights.
colors.secondary: Neon Green (#00ff94) - Used for success states, secondary accents, and gradients.
colors.accent: Electric Purple (#7000ff) - Used for depth and subtle background glows.

background.highlight: Dark Blue/Grey (#111827) - Slightly lighter for contrast.

text.muted: Blue-Grey (#94a3b8) - Secondary text, labels, and meta-data.

typography.headings: Bold (700 weight). H1 often uses a horizontal gradient (Cyan to Green). Letter-spacing is slightly tight (-0.02em).

design_style.borders: Exceedingly subtle white borders (10% opacity) for glass cards.
design_style.radius: Consistent rounded corners (16px) for cards and inputs. Buttons are fully pill-shaped or rounded.
design_style.shadows: Soft, colored glow shadows for interactive elements. Deep distinct shadows for floating cards.
